mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into quartz_job (name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, start_at, end_at, delete_time, delete_by ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update quartz_job set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_class = #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_group = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_at = #{startAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_by = #{deleteBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, start_at, end_at, delete_time, delete_by from quartz_job where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, start_at, end_at, delete_time, delete_by from quartz_job
mapper.delete: delete from quartz_job where job_group = #{jobGroup} and job_class = #{jobClass}
